active_skill.name: Kiss of Temptation
active_skill.description:
Enters the flying state, shooting homing bullets at enemies to deal Ether DMG and inflict Ether Anomaly Buildup.

DMG Multiplier: 100%*3/106.6%*3/113.3%*3/120%*3/126.6%*3

Daze Multiplier: 58.5%*3/62.4%*3/66.3%*3/70.2%*3/74.1%*3
Cooldown 30s

additional_ability.name: Ether Activity Increase
additional_ability.description:
When there are at least 2 Ether Attribute characters in your squad:
Bangboo Chain Attack inflicts 40%/50%/60%/70%/80% more Anomaly Buildup.
After activating Bangboo Chain Attack, the coordination state lasts for 5/6/7/8/9 more seconds and can activate 4/5/6/7/8 more times.

chain_attack.name: Kiss of Confusion
chain_attack.description:
Fires a laser at the target and then enters the coordination state. Under this state, fires homing bullets in coordination with the on-field character's attacks, dealing Ether DMG and inflicting Ether Anomaly Buildup for up to 30s or 10 activations.

DMG Multiplier: 490.5%/523.2%/555.9%/588.6%/621.3%

Co-DMG Multiplier: 70.5%/75.2%/79.9%/84.6%/89.3%

Daze Multiplier: 55.5%*2/59.2%*2/62.9%*2/66.6%*2/70.3%*2

Co-Daze Multiplier: 8.2%*2/8.8%*2/9.3%*2/9.9%*2/10.4%*2
